articles.author: James Quinlan
articles.title: Who Arsenal can play in Champions League quarter-final as full list of teams confirmed - Football.London
articles.description: Arsenal earned their place in the last eight of the Champions League on Tuesday, then on Wednesday discovered the full list of potential opponents they could face in the next round
articles.content:
The full eight-team list for the UEFA Champions League quarter-finals - including Arsenal - has now been confirmed after the conclusion of Wednesday's fixtures.
On Tuesday Mikel Arteta's side had a … [+2687 chars]
